name: Bionic Blitz #PGMA
description:
Welcome to Bionic Blitz! (round one PGMA entry) 

✦ 2000+ blocks

✦ No advertising whatsoever (it will be deleted) 

✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥ ♥ Use WASD to move the 

player 

♥ Press the space key to shoot your laser gun ♥ Stop moving to reload ♥ Press R to

 generate the map again if you're stuck 

✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥ ✦

 Avoid robots & shoot them with your laser. ✦ The purple bar indicates your laser battery.

 ✦Once the battery on your laser runs out, reload. 

✦ Once you've defeated all the robots, a new wave of enemies will spawn 

✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥

♥ Coding by klovater (tile tutorial by griffpatch) ♥ Art made by mushy ♥ Music by XenMachine ♥ Most SFX by mushy
